Reviews.Title: upstar 25 inch lcd tv
Reviews.Author: mimi
Reviews.Content: picture is great. easy to put together and setup was easy. delivery as promised. light weight.nice looking .love it.great bargain

Reviews.Title: Pretty dang good tv
Reviews.Author: Robert Gerard
Reviews.Content: Sounds actually pretty good. I like this tv. Perfect for watching shows, movies, as a monitor, and a game screen. Good tv.

Reviews.Title: Good Tv and Price
Reviews.Author: kevin
Reviews.Content: I had this tv for a month now and the the picture looks amazing the only problem is the sound but over all its was worth the buy.

Reviews.Title: not too good
Reviews.Author: H. Taylor
Reviews.Content: The upstar TV was not compatable with my equiptment and the sound was not very good. I would not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good TV, Lousy base.
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Pretty good as monitor/TV, it has troubles with resolution, i couldnt use max HD 1980x1090 cos I connected by HDMI, and it crops the image somehow with my computer, but... No problem, 1770x1000 is pretty good definition still. A lil flaw is the base, it tilts and squeaks, lousy and faulty but since I use as monitor than tv, i don't mind at all. Ah finally the audio is just fine, not so loud but is pretty normal on a cheap TV, if you look HD sound, get some speakers then.

Reviews.Title: Great picture and value
Reviews.Author: chad
Reviews.Content: This tv has a great 1080p picture, especially on bluray.The sound is ok, but not terrible.The hdmi port is in a bad place and kind of hard to plug in.Overall a great tv and picture.Highly recommend this product, buy one now!

Reviews.Title: Great screen, great price.
Reviews.Author: Steven Luke Oehlman
Reviews.Content: This is a great replacement for my older smaller PC monitor, with the bonus side of working as  a tv as well. I have had know problems with it. I have used it for connect the following: cable tv, Blu-ray DVD player (also with Netflix/Hulu) through HDMI, xbox 360 through component, and PC through VGA. The quality always looks great. I love this screen, good for close up as well as distance.

Reviews.Title: Best & bad.
Reviews.Author: arweim
Reviews.Content: Very good product for the price. The best: image 1080p. The bad: sound (need a soundbar or home theater) and clock

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Lynne Carrell
Reviews.Content: It is a great tv.  The price is right and everything about it I enjoy.  I recommend this to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Exactly what the other reviews said
Reviews.Author: venn177
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality, average audio quality.There's not much else to say about it, really. It's a cheap 1080p monitor with average-ish audio.

Reviews.Title: Fast delivery, good picture.
Reviews.Author: Evan M Andersen
Reviews.Content: Good picture but I was disappointed with the sound. It is tinny. I plugged some external speakers in to it and now it sounds good. For the price, good deal.

Reviews.Title: the best for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: the sound is a little tinny, but what do you expect from the teeny weeny speakers...the picture is GREAT..we love it!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome tv/monitor for price
Reviews.Author: Shirl
Reviews.Content: a very nice  tv/monitor for the price I got mine with prize rebel crisp hd picture user friendly good buy  http://www.prizerebel.com/d.php?r=5403367&l;=52

Reviews.Title: Still Waiting!
Reviews.Author: Joe Momma
Reviews.Content: I would like to review this product but I ordered it 9 days ago and if yet to receive it. it hasn't even made it to my state yet. The tracking is the worst i've ever see with updates only coming every 4 days.

ProductInfo.Features:
Active Screen Size: 24.5.
Aspect Ratio: 16:9 Wide Screen.
Brightness: 450 cd/m2.
Dynamic Contrast Ratio: 50,000:1 (TYP).
Resolution: 1920 x 1080.
ProductInfo.Name: Upstar P250WT 25-Inch LCD-Lit 60Hz TV
